var mapId = $gameMap._mapId; $gameMap.events().forEach(function(ev) { var EventName = ev.event().name; var eventId = ev.eventId(); if (EventName == 'Pit'){ var Event = ev.event(); var x = Event.x; var y = Event.y; var eventKey = [mapId, eventId, 'C']; var mySwitchValue = $gameSelfSwitches.value(eventKey); if (mySwitchValue != true){ var lowestID = $gameMap.eventIdXy(x,y); if (lowestID != 0 && lowestID != eventId){ var boulderKey = [mapId, lowestID, 'C']; var boulderSwitchValue = $gameSelfSwitches.value(boulderKey); if (boulderSwitchValue != true){ $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(eventKey, true); $gameSelfSwitches.setValue(boulderKey, true); }; }; }; }; });
